name: PET (itch)
description:
Just browsing, or are you here for adoption? 

Take care of you very own PET , or Purple ExtraTerrestrial, I think it likes you.

Touch screen and mobile (on web brewers) supported!

Instructions

Watch your pet and judge the mood to give them what they want.

Press each button to give your pet something although these buttons will only work if your pet is in the mood for it. 

So you might have to wait a few seconds before you can interact.

The background button in the lower right will flip through the various backgrounds.

Development

This game is made with and for the GDevelop game Jam. 

This is the first version of the game that I plan to upgrade if it’s something people like. This only took me a couple days so with more time I'm sure I can make many more improvements.

Liluo: https://liluo.io/games/999dcd68-afb8-435d-a521-9f491a12886e
